memberships.name: NP Membership
memberships.description: Tailored for non-profit organizations, this membership is free and provides fundamental access to resources and support for charitable entities.

memberships.name: Bronze Membership
memberships.description: Delivers essential benefits and services at a low cost. Ideal for individuals or small businesses seeking basic access to resources and networking opportunities.

memberships.name: Silver Membership
memberships.description: Offers additional advantages and improved services compared to the Bronze level. This mid-tier membership is perfect for those looking for more comprehensive support and greater community engagement.

memberships.name: Gold Membership
memberships.description: The top-tier membership level, providing the widest range of benefits and exclusive services. This option is ideal for individuals seeking maximum access to resources, premium support, and elite networking opportunities.
